programme.title: Pope John Paul II (1920 – 2005)
programme.short_synopsis: How Pope John Paul II's instillation caused excitement in America.
programme.medium_synopsis: The instillation of Pope John Paul II in 1978 caused a flutter amongst the Polish immigrants in Long Island who worship at Our Lady of Ostrobrama.
